itunes:author: iBooks
title: Augusten Burroughs: One-on-One
description: Augusten Burroughs' memoir, A Wolf at the Table, explores the author's terrifying relationship with his father, as well as the radical pendulum swing between love and hate. Featuring a dramatic reading by Burroughs, the audiobook also includes four original songs by Patti Smith, Tegan Quin, Ingrid Michaelson, and Sea Wolf.
itunes:subtitle: The author discusses his memoir.
